item.title: Kill 8080
item.description: Kill 8080 port with cmd If you are using Windows, it’s can be useful to kill certain port. I will show you, how to kill the process : netstat -ano | findstr :8080 taskkill /PID typeyourPIDhere

item.title: Blur
item.description: Blur What is Blur function in jQuery ? It is used to remove focus from the selected elements. Code $(selector).blur(function) For more information Click here

item.title: Good Bye PHP5 ğŸ˜¥
item.description: Good Bye PHP5 [14.04.2004-31.12.2018] 14 years of love story with PHP5, now finish, since the new year 2019 ! I started, learned, praticed with this version of PHP. Now PHP5, since December 31, 2018, security support for PHP 5.6.x is officially cease ; marking the end of all support for any version of the ancient PHP 5.x branch ğŸ˜¥ What does it mean ? It exposes hundreds of millions of websites (who still running on PHP 5.

item.title: Render Html Tags
item.description: Render HTML Tags When you store HTML tags in your database, you would like to retrieve these datas as HTML Content, not a string right ? <?php echo $row['description']; ?>` Maybe when you want to display this data, it show as a string character : <ul><li>Hello, I am PHP</li></ul> Don’t worry, call your best elePHPhant ğŸ˜ and use htmlspecialchars_decode() The htmlspecialchars() function converts some predefined characters to HTML entities

item.title: Let's 2019 Begin
item.description: Happy New Year 2019 ğŸ† Yeah first post of the year. Let me wish you a Happy New Year. Big project, big work, big ambition, this year will be exciting! What super fun thing am I planning to do in 2019 ? Read more books ğŸ“š Train more ElePHPhant in PHP ğŸ˜ Starting to interest in Django Framework ğŸ¦ Maintain XPlaneLoverâœˆï¸ & MyBearIsYellow ğŸ» Blog Find a project to contribute in Open Source regularly That’s the kinda thing, I’m gonna to do…
